meanings.definition: A flat-bottomed boat used for transporting goods on rivers and canals.
meanings.sent1: The schuit slowly floated down the calm river.
meanings.sent2: The schuit carried barrels of apples down the canal.
meanings.sent3: The schuit decided to take a detour and explore a new waterway.
meanings.sent4: The schuit glided through the water like a silent shadow.
meanings.sent5: The old wooden schuit creaked as it navigated the narrow canal.

meanings.definition: To transport goods on a schuit.
meanings.sent1: They decided to schuit the supplies to the village downstream.
meanings.sent2: We will schuit the cargo on the river tomorrow.
meanings.sent3: He schuited the goods with a big smile on his face.
meanings.sent4: She schuited the packages as if they were delicate treasures.
meanings.sent5: The team worked together to schuit the heavy crates onto the boat.
